are no 12V  output pins on the Rio. So you can only do the 5V LEDS powered from the RIO. The power rail for the PWM outputs is actually 6V. The power rail on the DIO is 5V The logic pins for both the DIO and PWM only source logic levels of current.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe short answer: Can’t say anything about the Target LEDs without seeing the specs.
